testcase.name: rest API employee test
testcase.system-out: Given url "http://dummy.restapiexample.com/api/v1/employees" .............. passed When method GET ........................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed * match response.status == 'success' ...................................... passed * match response.status == '#string' ...................................... passed * match response.data == '#array' ......................................... passed * print response.data[0].employee_name .................................... passed * match response.data[0].employee_name contains 'Tiger' ................... passed
